channel.title: Haidt on Let's see what happens.
channel.description: Recent content in Haidt on Let's see what happens.

item.title: The Righteous Mind
item.description: Found-out that scribd has some good stuff that I wanted to check like this title. So I got over first three chapters in audio format. Looking at how it goes I would switch to the short version in this case. Don’t eat while listening to it because the author does alot of stuff in the beginning for sure. I think consciously but who knows; Even though narrated by the author the experience is very copy-paste/so-conventional from the execution point of view.
